section.title: Provision a server with an isolated network (nova-network API/nova client)

note.para:
You cannot attach an isolated network to an existing server. However, to work around this limitation, you can create an image of the server and build a new server based on that image. When you build the new server, you can attach the isolated network. For information, see
Attach a Cloud Network to an Existing Cloud Server. To use the create image API, see
Create Image.
You can use the &virt_ext; to attach an isolated network to an existing server. For information, see Attach Your Network to an Existing Server.
